definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: China's biological resources are among the world's richest.
sentences.chinese: 中國生物資源是在最富有之中在世界上。

sentences.english: We have only a limited time to work and build success while we live on this planet.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，我們工作和追求成功的時間很有限。

sentences.english: You have a one-way ticket, don't waste it.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，你只有一張單程票，別浪費瞭它。

sentences.english: Norway has also made an international impact as a high-technology country.
sentences.chinese: 挪威作爲一個高新技術的國家在世界上也有重大影響。

sentences.english: All over the world, there are classes that teach people how to flirt.
sentences.chinese: 在世界上，到處都有教人們如何調情的課程。

sentences.english: The United Nations estimates there are over 300,000 child soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國估計在世界上有超過300，000個童兵。

sentences.english: After Seth was born, Adam lived 800 years and had other sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 亞當生塞特之後，又在世八百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: I live on all the continents of the world except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 我住在世界上除南極洲以外的所有的陸地上。

sentences.english: Therefore, the main concern of Confucianism is the happiness of people in this world.
sentences.chinese: 因此，孔教最關心的，是人們在世的幸福。

sentences.english: Where can you make that kind of money in this world?
sentences.chinese: 在世界上哪個地方可以賺這種錢呢？

sentences.english: I live on all the continents except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 除了南極洲，我住在世界上所有的陸地上。

sentences.english: As an individual country, America still leads the world by some distance.
sentences.chinese: 按單國來論，美國在世界上仍然遙遙領先。

sentences.english: So nice to know there are jackalopes around.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，起伏不定，很高興跳跳羊和我們相依。

sentences.english: Life on earth is just the dress rehearsal before the real production.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，其實只是彩排，爲未來公演之日作準備。

sentences.english: The speeches also dealt with the international situation and America’s place in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這些演說也涉及到國際形勢和美國在世界上的地位。

sentences.english: If James Fenimore Cooper were here today he would surely have to change his tune.
sentences.chinese: 如果今天柯柏還在世的話，他就得改變他的論調了。

definition: approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
lit. reputation will go down in history (idiom); fig. achievements will earn eternal glory
(of a deceased) during one's life/while living
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
the world/this world/the world of the living
the present age/in office/the current office holder
